from T_VS_BillCheckEntry
order by ${orderByClause}

foid = #{foid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fobillid = #{fobillid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

fentryid = #{fentryid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

fdeltime = #{fdeltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update T_VS_BillCheckEntry set funqty = #{funqty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, feligqty = #{feligqty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, freason = #{freason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fresult = #{fresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(fqty) FROM T_VS_BillCheckEntry E LEFT JOIN T_VS_BillCheck C on C.fid = E.fbillid WHERE foid = #{foid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND C.fstatus > 0
SELECT SUM(feligqty) FROM T_VS_BillCheckEntry E LEFT JOIN T_VS_BillCheck C on C.fid = E.fbillid WHERE foid = #{foid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND C.fstatus = 2
SELECT SUM(funqty) FROM T_VS_BillCheckEntry E LEFT JOIN T_VS_BillCheck C on C.fid = E.fbillid WHERE foid = #{foid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND C.fstatus = 2
SELECT SUM(fqty) FROM T_VS_BillCheckEntry WHERE foid = #{foid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT SUM(fqty) FROM T_VS_BillCheckEntry WHERE foid = #{foid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND fid <> #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT SUM(feligqty) FROM T_VS_BillCheckEntry WHERE foid = #{foid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT SUM(funqty) FROM T_VS_BillCheckEntry WHERE foid = #{foid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT M.*, C.*, S.*, E.fdeldate AS fguartime FROM T_VS_BillCheckEntry C LEFT JOIN T_VS_BillEntry E ON C.foid = E.fid LEFT JOIN T_VS_Material M ON E.fmaid = M.fid LEFT JOIN T_VS_Stock S ON C.fstockid = S.fid WHERE C.fbillid = #{fbillid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
